name: GeoRunner
description:
You are a member of the Blit Rescue and Tracking Squad (BRATS). Your unit's mission is to rescue Blit whenever he gets captured, which is basically his job. Blit skateboards, crashes, and ends up in a cage. In order to free Blit, you must find a number of keys scattered across different countries in a region. To obtain the keys, the game tests your geographical knowledge.

GeoRunner prompts you to select a region of the world (North & Central America, South America, Africa, etc.) and to configure a skill level. The skill level determines a number of settings:* The difficulty of the clues. Early levels simply tell the player to visit a certain country. Later levels challenge the player on capitals or even trivia related to the country.

description: Bee Hero: Bug Blaster is an Action RPG Looter Shooter with a focus on build theorycrafting. Exterminate bug hordes, collect gold and items, level up, acquire new skills, upgrade your weapon and fight bosses.

name: Dawn of Survivor
description: A third-person survivor roguelike game where waves of zombies come at you. By killing them, you get random opportunities to acquire equipment, weapons, and new skills. You can have up to 8 skills, giving you immense power. Come and see how far you can go!

name: The Life and Suffering of Prince Jerian
description: This is a narrative role-playing game telling the story of a crown prince of the Blessed Arknian Empire. You possess great power, but are also burdened by duty. Can you change the world and stay true to yourself? Every decision comes with a cost.

name: Goooool!
description: Have you ever tried playing cards with a bear? But bears don't know how to play cards... That in this incredible game you will feel yourself in the role of a bear who is trying to play cards, but he does not succeed. All he can do is smash everything around and scream Goooool!

name: Exo Mayhem
description: Exo Mayhem is the ultimate supervillain experience! Fly, Shoot, Stab, Explode, and Traverse Paradise Mall, a lush multi-biome open world ripe for conquering!

name: Little Droid 2: Escape
description: "Little Droid 2: Escape" is a classic 2D (Metroidvania) side-scrolling pixel art adventure where you need to find a way to escape a mysterious planet.

name: Sex Machina
description: The city was destroyed and deserted long ago. But the stalker and his sidekick, a super sexy female robot, were on the lookout for all sorts of dangers. The hot female wildling turned out to be more of an insane sexual adventure than danger, though. The two used her body to commit every sin known!

name: Sunday Morning
description: Yes, yes, I know. The house is a mess, and I should clean it. But you know what? I'm feeling, like, reeeally lazy. If only I had some music to motivate me... Wait, I love this song!

name: RaiLRhythm
description: The concept of this music game is “Train x Rhythm”! You can enjoy the music game as if you are driving a train! Hit the notes rhythmically to become a top-notch driver!

name: Hook-a-Duck VR
description: Exactly what it says on the tin; Hook-a-duck, in VR! ...except some of the ducks have outboard motors, and can actually "fly".

name: Alchemist Shop Simulator
description: Conquer the arcane market in Alchemist Shop Simulator! Set up your very own magical store, full of wonders. Keep expanding your business! Experiment with ingredients bought or home-grown in your garden to brew potions for your quirky clientele. Buy low, sell high, make your store legendary!

name: Egyptian Punishment
description: All slaves has to be punished for misdemeanor. Watch as the queen summons an exotic futa slave and orders her demonic beast to punish the girl's filthy fuck hole. Things get heated quickly, soon it’s the queen’s hole enjoys the slave’s shaft. It all ends with a well-deserved bath of monster cum!

name: Let Them Breathe: Selena's Awakening
description: Selena awakes in a dark and hot room where fire burns in stone ovens. She is told by her "roommate" she needs to find the key to unlock the door. Unlucky for Selena, she has to find many keys to unlock many doors all the while enemies lurk in the shadows.

name: Hostile Takeover
description: A 3-10 player space station scavenging social deduction game. Will you be able to meet quota with your team? Or will you do everything in your power to sabotage them as the traitor?

name: Bloody Sky
description: This is a game where you defeat three bosses. The hero's challenge continues until all the bosses are defeated.

name: Loki's Revenge
description: Loki’s Revenge is a bullet heaven roguelite where you play as Norse gods fighting Loki’s army of monsters! Level up to gain powerful upgrades and explore the hand-crafted maps to find secret items. Build the ultimate overpowered god with permanent upgrades and master each god’s signature weapon.

name: Bazaar Simulator
description: Bring the traditional market experience to the modern world! Arrange vegetables and fruits on stalls and fulfill customer orders. Set prices, hire staff, and expand your market. Online orders, home delivery, and much more coming soon.

name: PirateWar
description: piratewar is an fps/tps game. Kill your enemies and win.

name: Say Cheese
description: Hunger speaks louder! Help our rodent hero find his way to the cheese in a maze full of challenges

name: Block Bot: Puzzle Journey
description: BlockBot: Shape-shifting puzzle adventure in a vibrant pixel world. Transform, solve, explore. Each level unlocks new potential. Perfect for quick plays or long sessions, offering unique challenges every time you dive in.

name: Ker-Chunk!
description: Kalva is a bit clumsy, losing all his catnip, but maybe, just maybe, this weird catnip-eating cave has some treasure in it.

name: Bunny Bunker
description: Bunny Bunker is a small game, mixing City Builder with Tower Defence, where your objective is to help the bunnies build a Bunny colony that is strong enough to send bunnies into space, inorder to escape the ever growing hordes that attack your Bunny Colony.

name: Angel Guardian
description: Angel Guardian is a side-scrolling action shooter where players take on the role of Kita, a warrior guardian, tasked with saving a prince from the forces of evil. Players can use action shooting, stealth, and hacking to defeat enemies and overcome obstacles

name: Mage's Legacy
description: Mage's Legacy: Explore the World of Magic

name: To and Fro
description: An action adventure 3D platformer game in VR. Run, jump, swim, and climb through a lush, colorful world. Collect an assortment of items and power up abilities to access new areas.

name: Blu-Dude In The Quest for Chocolate Milk
description: Blu-Dude in the Quest for Chocolate Milkis a whimsical and lighthearted puzzle game that invites players into a world of fun and silliness. Join Blu-Dude, a quirky sprite who loves to flap his arms, on a delightful adventure to find the ultimate treat—chocolate milk!

name: Pixel Collector
description: Collect Pixelart items! Get 1-4 tickets every 2 hours to spin the lucky wheel. Win pixelart items or higher rarity tickets! All items appear in your Steam inventory and are tradable/marketable, making it easier to complete your collections.

name: JetWireClimber
description: Mole Dad aims for the surface, flying around inside the cave! A flying-type climbing game.

name: The Journey into the Virtual Void
description: The Journey into the Virtual Void is a captivating low-poly VR platformer/adventure game, reminiscent of classic 90s platformers like Mario 64.

name: Frontline Crisis
description: This is a top-down shooter with tower defense elements‘ set during the great war between insects and humans.

name: Hunting Seas
description: Hunting Seas is a Dark Turn-based Boss Hunt RPG. In a flooded world plagued by deep sea horrors, lead a fleet of ship to survival. Hunt larger than life creatures; use their meat and bones to feed your crew; Sail and discover the secrets of the sea...

name: Dragon Clicker
description: Every click changes the color of your dragon, collect drops every 3 hours!

name: X Simulator Drone
description: Experience stunning drone realism with two difficulty levels. Fly two advanced drones across beautiful maps. Switch perspectives, including a controllable drone camera, for the ultimate piloting challenge.

name: Beach Secrets
description: Embark on a quest to uncover the "Beach Secrets"! This captivating 3D game lets you fly across the map and search for hidden objects, unraveling the mysteries and secrets of an enigmatic beach.

name: Alterworld
description: Explore the infinite world! Play with the fully destructible voxel terrain! Craft and split items! Build and customize a house or any building! And many more! This is the ultimate sandbox survival game where you can do almost anything you can dream!

name: Sodablood
description: Chase pins as a bowling ball with dreamlike abilities in a surreal bowling alley.

name: Splort
description: Use your elastic hand to climb, push and fight your friends in this intense local multiplayer physics-based combat mayhem, across countless levels, with a huge variety of unique weapons at your disposal.

name: The Untethered Void
description: What if artificial intelligence is not evolution incarnate and humanity is left with only Pain as an evolutionary driver. The Untethered Void is a Adventure game in a future world where to be asked to be cured of your fundamental despair, is to ask to be cured of what little self you may have.

name: Meridian
description: MERIDIAN is a wellness VR journey through your body, exploring its properties and limitations. Develop new control and sensation. You follow, learn about yourself, learn how to breathe, and embrace the struggle. Then you get better. Then you repeat.

name: Refarm
description: The ocean took it all… now take it back! In this short semi-idle island builder you’ll resurface fertile farmland - tile by tile. As you plant, harvest and expand you’ll obtain helping hands and discover what else lies below the surface.

name: Live Lens
description: Experience the intensity of frontline combat in Live Lens, a hyper-realistic bodycam-style shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5. Engage in tactical gameplay, navigate dynamic environments, and uncover a gripping conspiracy. Are you ready for the ultimate tactical shooter experience?

name: Laser Circle
description: Laser Circle - A 2D pixel top-down shooter game where you play as a spherical blob that destroys enemies with weapons that become more powerful with each level, while the blob itself also gets stronger.

name: Concrete
description: Congratulations [CITIZEN NAME]. Your personal identifier number was selected in the monthly Citizen Labour Lottery. Report to City Block 07 to begin your work assignment. Welcome, work hard, and ignore all signs of life: you are alone.

name: The Faceless Killer
description: The Faceless Killer is a first-person survival horror game with retro PS1-style graphics, consisting of 3 chapters. Solve logic puzzles, fight against your enemies, or hide when there's no other option. Unravel this mystery surrounding the Faceless Killer. Who is he, and what are his motivations?

name: Stick It!
description: It's a challenging platform climbing game featuring sticks as playable characters, which can be played with friends.

name: Phil's Contract
description: Phil's Contract is a 2D platformer with fast-paced movement with an emphasis bunny-hopping and beat 'em up-esque combat. Featuring charming, yet grimy pixel art inspired from the likes of flash animations.

name: Noircotics
description: All drugs are legal in the city. Your job is to manipulate them to keep up with the demands of the mobs.

name: The Good Old Days
description: A nostalgic metroidvania from the good old days back in 19XX. Take on the role of Sean, a young boy who ventures into the fictional city of Arostia to repay his father's debt. Rescue your 3 friends from imprisonment, defeat strong enemies, all while getting your debt paid in time!

name: Ghost Keeper
description: Become a Ghost Keeper and lead your fearsome minions against the living. Use diverse scare tactics, manage demonic creatures and harness dozens of skills. Oh, and don’t let the Brotherhood catch you! The ultimate scaring experience begins…

name: Extreme Jump
description: Welcome to the adrenaline-fueled realm of the Extreme Jumping Simulator!

name: Capybara Park
description: Manage your own capybara park in this cozy relaxing management game. Improve the well-being of your capybaras, build new enclosures, unlock new species and much more!

name: Mageanoid
description: Silly computer game about a mage

name: ShipOS 1994
description: Are you ready to recover your family's fortune and rebuild the greatest shipping empire the world has ever known? Well if you are, then you're going to need the latest integrated shipping management system to get you there. Welcome, to ShipOS 1994

name: Airsoft Range
description: Play against AI in free play mode with difficulties ranging a walk in the park to fighting a literal aimbot or get lost in the immersive campaign going from a no one to a superstar. All in VR

name: Captured
description: Trapped in what appears to be an endless hallway in your home, rooms begin to feel unfamiliar. Spot the differences, capture the anomalies, and stay away from any sinister entities.

name: Retro Relics
description: Retro Relics is a cozy sandbox and story-driven treasure hunting simulation, where you immerse yourself into nature and search for ancient artifacts with your metal detector. Explore, dig, help other people find lost belongings and complete your coin and relics collection!

name: Rev'd Up Racing
description: Rev'd Up Racing is a fast paced, action packed arcade racing game which will push your driving skills to the limit. Destroy the competition and prove that you are an expert racer in a variety of events and challenges including, tournaments, time trials, drifts and more.

name: Seoul Station
description: This game is a “Find the Difference” game set in the Korean subway system. At the start, you will board the normal 0th train. Once you move to the 1st train, the real adventure begins. From the 1st train onward, you need to find differences from the 0th train.

name: I am Sorry
description: "I am Sorry" is a game where you investigate objects and solve puzzles to uncover the story. Become a janitor, clean the house, and uncover the hidden truths of the story.

name: Control the Ball
description: Control the Ball is a fun and addictive game where you play as a boy who is passionate about soccer and loves to make scissors with the ball.

name: Mages of Osmea
description: Mages of Osmea is a top down spellslinging RPG where you create your own spells to defeat corrupted monsters. Fight through waves of monsters and bosses, completing objectives in singleplayer or with friends.

name: What's the Point?
description: Experience the ultimate existential crisis simulator! Our FPS-loving indie studio took an unexpected detour into philosophy. Push a metaphorical boulder, question life's purpose, and maybe find meaning (or just sore muscles). It's Sisyphus meets game dev madness in our debut title.

name: Thebes
description: Deploy your pawns, plan your strategy, and make your way through the sunlit plains of Thebes to destroy the enemy fortress, but keep an eye on the fog of war, as enemies might catch you off guard and destroy yours. Activate the abilities of the pieces to gain various advantages during your turn.

name: Closed World
description: HD-2D Dungeon Exploration JRPG. Strengthen your weapons and armor with obtained materials and acquire hidden skills across the land to delve deeper into the world. Conquer complex labyrinths, break the seals of the world, and aim for the land of ancient legends!

name: Domain Owner
description: This game takes you into a pure strategy arena, with simple yet elegant graphics.

name: Kick Them All
description: Self-defense is not a crime—it's a necessity!

name: Stock Stack
description: "Stock Stack" is a simple game that simulates stock investment and it can be used to educate or compete with your friend Maybe whoever know about investment market more can be a winner because this game reflects the working principles of the real stock market. (not at all!)

name: Rabbit on Skateboard
description: Welcome to the world of rabbits and carrots! In Rabbit on Skateboard

name: Jetpack Man
description: Take to the skies in Jetpack Man, the game that brings a thrilling and innovative twist to aerial adventures.

name: Black Submarine
description: Deep into the unknown, navigate the shadows to uncover forgotten treasures. Every click, a choice; every shadow, a secret. Embark on a sinister underwater journey in search of a lost pirate legacy.

name: Can You See What I See?: Dream Machine
description: Sin descripción

name: Silent Scream II: The Bride
description: Jessica would never imagine that her big day would turn out to be a nightmare; they had an accident and Jonathan McNealy, her husband, is missing. Things just got more and more bizarre when she encountered a mysterious girl who seemed to be leading her to Jonathan. Jessica had a feeling that the girl was connected to Jonathan. Did she cause the car accident in the first place? Return to the abandoned mansion and search for clues in Silent Scream II : The Bride.

name: Fright Chasers: Director's Cut
description: When rumors of an abandoned movie theater and the ghosts that can apparently abduct the living there appear on your blog, you eagerly go to investigate. When you arrive, you quickly find truth to the tales as you encounter specters from the very movies shown in the theater! Can you navigate your way through dangerous films to save the living in time? Find out in this thrilling Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: Fright Chasers: Soul Reaper
description: Prominent people in the town of Glenville have begun disappearing. After receiving an anonymous tip, you learn that the disappearances may be the work of a supernatural killer. This sounds like another job for the Fright Chasers! Can you solve the mystery of Glenville and stop the murderer before they claim any more victims? Find out in this bone-chilling hidden-object puzzle adventure game!

name: Brony Cards
description: Brony Cards is ponified version of 2048 made in Adobe Flash.

name: Midnight
description:
Midnight is a pixelated survival horror game with a dark theme. In this game, you must help the protagonist collect seven letters of the deadly sins to repent the sins of your past. The game features a non-linear storyline that varies and changes according to the decisions you made. Try to collect and read the optional documents that you find the dive deeper into story and understand everything. Will you be able to make it out in one piece?

Note: The game can only be played on Chrome, Firefox or Opera

name: Diablo IV: Season of the Infernal Hordes
description: The most ferocious demonic forces have erupted into Sanctuary. Combat demonic hordes in the new Infernal Hordes feature in both Seasonal and Eternal Realms. Pursue new hellish powers with over 50 new Uniques and Legendaries. Cross paths with Lilith’s followers who warn of Sanctuary’s imminent demise at Mephisto’s hand. Pursue new rewards through the Battle Pass, Season Journey, and a new Seasonal Progression.

name: Fading Faith
description: Fading Faith is a Historical Fiction Dungeon Crawler featuring a challenging blend of exploration, survival and historical learning.Explore the dungeons beneath medieval Jerusalem where philosophers and mystics from across history now stand as testaments to their failed quests.

name: Silent Still
description: Silent Still is a short first-person psychological horror game about sleep paralysis.

name: Thou Shalt Not Kill
description: "Thou Shalt Not Kill" is a VHS-style first-person walking simulator horror game. You play as Angel, a girl traveling through the forest who finds a VHS tape lying on the ground. She starts watching it, only to discover that the footage is unsettling and tells a mysterious story. As you watch the entire tape, you realize this is no ordinary VHS footage, and you are shocked by its revelations.

description: Play with up to 4 players local or online, in Blood for The Old Gods. A flintlock fantasy rogue-lite where you shoot, summon, and survive your way across the war torn countryside, once quaint villages, and sprawling industrial towns culminating in the final showdown against the New Gods.

description: The Ancient Worlds expansion for Millennia has new options and gameplay choices for the early parts of the game, with new abilities and experiences, a new National Spirit and a new government type.

description: Designed to recreate the feel of Knee Deep in the Dead as a short and simple E1 replacement.

description: Complete replacement for episode 2 of Doom

name: Realm of Shades
description: Realm of Shades is a episode replacement PWAD for Doom II created by Pedro Francisco Puicón (NokturnuS). It is NokturnuS' first public release, and is an episode containing seven levels utilizing some custom textures.

name: Spire
description: This is a five map hub for Zdoom (recommend playing in GZDOOM). The Gameplay is largely arena based with some hard fights thrown in to try and challenge players.

name: Heroes' Tales
description: The project from iddqd.ru the community, basis of which are maps, made in a speed- mapping course, on which only 4 hours were allowed (each speedmapping contest - 4 hours length). Of the 33 maps in this megawad, all but 14 were part of these speedmapping contests.

name: Car Race
description: Sin descripción

name: House Party - Business and Pleasure Style Pack
description:
This DLC includes several new clothing and hairstyle customization options for the House Party characters.

All of these items can be customized like other House Party clothing items. Mix and match these new items and existing items to create incredible character designs! The transformation options are endless!

Select each item's primary and secondary colors and metallic properties. Then choose one of the over 100 patterns and customize the pattern's color, size, rotation, embossing, glow, and metallic properties. Add a decal to make it even more your own and then share it with the House Party community with our new design sharing feature!

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Auto Legends
description:
Auto Legends is forged from the passion of car culture.

Immerse yourself in an authentic automotive experience where high stakes pink slip racing meets endless customization. Race and tune your car with real-world performance and visual options, creating the perfect ride that expresses your unique style.

Connect with fellow enthusiasts in an automotive social network. Challenge friends and rivals, join exhilarating car meets, and proudly showcase your latest build. Take your passion to the next level by creating parts, tuning rides, organizing events, or buying and selling cars to become a true tycoon in the car world.

Auto Legends offers multiple paths to greatness. Whatever route you choose, your legend begins here.

Unleash your inner car enthusiast with Auto Legends!

name: Tattoo Tycoon
description: Become a tattoo artist and manage your own tattoo parlor. Find the perfect designs for your curious customers and turn their vague wishes into amazing skin art. Grow from a small personal studio to a multi-parlor business throughout the different districts of Tattuga Bay.

name: Tiny Tim
description: Sin descripción

name: UFO Shooting
description: Sin descripción

name: The Eternal Life of Goldman
description: The Eternal Life of Goldman is a vibrant yet dark platformer adventure that weaves together legends, fairy tales and myths. Explore a vast hand-drawn Archipelago, inspired by ancient fables and depicted in classic frame-by-frame animation, and defeat a mysterious Deity!

name: Circledrive
description: Sin descripción

name: Starship Enterprise
description: Sin descripción

name: Wreckfest 2
description: Ready for mayhem? Wreckfest is back, offering the best in full-contact racing with unrivaled destruction! Witness head-to-head battles as you tear apart rival vehicles bit by bit. Powered by the enhanced physics engine, developed by the creators of Wreckfest & FlatOut!

name: Way of the Hunter: Lintukoto Reserve
description: Welcome to Lintukoto Reserve, a Scandinavian gem where the wild and serene blend seamlessly. This vast reserve offers a vast array of biomes and breathtaking landscapes that will captivate nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts alike.

name: Kletka
description: Kletka is a co-op horror game about going down in an elevator that is trying to eat you. Feed the elevator, explore deadly floors and descend deeper.

name: Ravenwood
description: Sin descripción

name: Earthless
description: Earthless is planned to be a complete 32-level project by James Paddock (Jimmy), with skies and sprites made by Fuzzball. It is the spiritual successor to Deathless.

name: Midnight Murder Club
description: Heart-pounding and hilarious multiplayer FPS fun. Trust your senses and overcome your fears as you’re armed with a flashlight and a revolver, then set against your friends in a pitch-black mansion with surprises around every corner. Hide, seek, & shoot in the dark.

name: The Mortuary Assistant: Definitive Edition
description:
Darkstone Digital is bringing more scares, more lore, and an endless embalming-only mode for those more interested in Rebecca's day-to-day work without the worry of being scared on August 2nd with The Mortuary Assistant: Definitive Edition!

Along with this free update to owners of Mortuary Assistant on PC and Nintendo Switch, the Definitive Edition is also going to be available on consoles! The Mortuary Assistant: Definitive Edition comes to PlayStation and Xbox on the same date with some new content too!
- Embalming only mode - embalm unlimited bodies
- New Haunt Events
- Additional Lore
- New bodies to embalm
- New Valentine's Day seasonal event (Stop by the mortuary in February)
- New achievements
- Multiple Bug and Stability Fixes
- Performance Improvements

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Lockdown
description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Lockdown is a mobile game in the Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Franchise based on Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Lockdown. Developed by Gameloft, it features gameplay similar to other mobile titles in the franchise but retains the overall story of its console counterpart. The game takes place in 2007, which in the plot echoes the events of Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas (Mobile).

name: Tomb Raider: Anniversary
description: The Wii port of Tomb Raider: Anniversary carries over the levels and general gameplay of the other versions while incorporating motion controls. Wii-exclusive first-person puzzles include breaking through walls with a pickaxe, using a flashlight in dark areas, assembling mechanisms from pieces found around the environment, manipulating symbol-based locks and using paper and charcoal to take rubbings of puzzle-related symbols, all utilizing the Wii Remote.

name: Barbie Project Friendship
description: Get ready for the ultimate Barbie gaming adventure as Barbie and Barbie work together to save a beloved Malibu landmark, the Malibu Waves Community Center! Join them and their friends on a fun adventure to transform six spaces into fabulous spots like the Pet Salon, Campsite, Tech Lab, and more.

name: DingDongVG's Summer Resort
description: Ding Dong has just received an exclusive invitation to a luxurious 5-star gaming resort, with the highlight of his stay being the world premiere screening of the DINGDONGVG GAMING AWARDS! In the absence of the Electronic Entertainment Expo, this resort has become the hotspot for a wide assortment of gaming personalities, video game mascots, and beloved sponsored products! Arriving at the resort - it seems that not everything is going according to plan... can you prepare everything in time for the big premiere?

name: Oh My Lord
description: Manage your medieval fantasy city, balance resources, and navigate the demands of different factions. Unlock new characters to join your city and help maintain order.

name: Arcade Boot Camp
description: You play a helmet with legs which wants to improve its arcade gaming skills. In order to achieve this you have to play through a series of mini games which are inspired by popular arcade games of the early 80s.

name: Pikmin 2: New Year
description: Pikmin 2: New Year is a Pikmin 2 ROM hack that was created by AmigaOwl, with the help of a development team, and was released on July 25th, 2021 to commemorate the twenty-year anniversary of Pikmin 1's release. The game has much of the same content as Pikmin 2, but features new music, areas, caves, cave themes, Challenge Mode stages, new or reskinned enemies, and one reskinned plant. Additionally, every treasure from Pikmin 2 appears in Pikmin 2: New Year.

name: Consecrated
description: Sin descripción

name: Your World According to a Single Word
description: Sin descripción

name: Pen to Paper
description: Sin descripción

name: Cash Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: Labor Power
description:
Grindstone, Inc. is an awful place to work at. But you can't organize a strike all on your own. You will need the help of your NPC coworkers — even if you have to physically pull them away from their screens.

Labor Power is a small Pikmin-inspired game dedicated to class solidarity and the betterment of working conditions. Labor Power took first place at Gamedev.js Jam 2024 (theme: Power)

name: Fate/Hollow Ataraxia Remastered
description: Remaster of the Fate/hollow ataraxia, a Japanese visual novel game and the sequel to Fate/stay night.

name: Panzer Corps 2: War Stories - Fall of Poland
description: An expansion for the WW2 turn-based strategy. In Panzer Corps 2: War Stories - Fall of Poland we can take control of Polish units during the German offensive in 1939. The add-on introduces various gameplay changes and the option to change real historical events.

name: Lyle in Cube Sector MD
description: A freeware metroidvania originally made by BogoSoft in 2006, now ported to Sega hardware by Mike Moffitt.

name: Card Chronicles: Devious Deck
description: Card Chronicles: Devious Deck merges roguelite gameplay with deckbuilding strategy, where every card played comes at the cost of the player's health points. Collect cards, build unique decks, battle fierce monsters and prove yourself worthy, while carefully managing your health. Uncover the truth, immerse in a gripping adventure as you ascend the Tower of Legends, where every decision matters and defines your path forward.

name: X-Out: Resurfaced
description: The underwater shoot ‘em up from game developer Rainbow Arts is finally returning in a faithful remake completely rebuilt from the ground up and greatly improved. The sprite work of yesteryear has not only been remade into modern high-resolution sprites but also expanded with particle and lighting effects.

name: Pikmin.com SpaceForce
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Keishou
description: Kyujitsu Island is in peril. As the aging Lord's power fades, the island descends into chaos. You, a chosen descendant, must embark on a perilous journey to become the new leader, the Keishou-sha. Battle rival clans, conquer the elements, and uncover ancient secrets to restore peace to this once-idyllic land. A shadow clan lurks in the shadows, seeking to exploit the island's turmoil. Can you overcome them and become the island's savior?

name: Ruin of the Fae Realm
description: A weekend + a few days jam map made for the cohost mapping potluck mapjam with theme of 'flow'.

name: Replicon
description: Medium - size base map for Arcane Dimensions.

name: The Nullspace
description: Originally 'The Nullspace', was a map submitted for Quake Brutalist Jam 2 by ExaByt. This is an expansion of it into a mini-episode consisting of 4 maps (including the original Nullspace, slightly updated/rebalanced), and a start map.

One year later, the fractured remains of the base are recovered by a manned ship called “Altair.” Among the remains was a frozen capsule containing the body of genius space engineer Zion Miller, and the android Flem nestled beside the capsule. And then there was Hope, the extraterrestrial life-form discovered in the Jupiter space.

A mysterious incident involving them and the crew soon occurs on-board the ship. Was this incident caused by the mysterious life-form? Or by the crew? With no means of escape, fear and suspicion spread throughout the ship…

You play as the Master AI of the spaceship Altair and end up partnering with Flem in order to solve the mystery. Issue commands to Flem and investigate the ship. Depending on the command, you may be able to communicate with the crew through physical contact and the like… Interact with the crew through various means and strengthen your relationships.

name: Vagabond's Quest 2
description: Vagabond's Quest 2 (VQ2) was an ambitious attempt to evolve the original Vagabond's Quest into a 3D web-based MMO during the late 1990s. This sequel retained the core pit-fighting and arena combat mechanics of its predecessor but introduced 3D graphics and a more immersive environment. VQ2 was designed to push the boundaries of web-based gaming at the time, featuring a blend of PvP combat and RPG elements in a fully 3D isometric world. Despite its innovative approach, the project faced numerous challenges, and the development was eventually abandoned.

name: TASO 131
description:
TASO 131 is a multiplayer action game from the 1990s. Players use helicopters, cruise missiles, ground troops and paratroopers to destroy opponents’ bases while defending their own. In the campaign mode, players also design their own bases in a manner similar to real-time strategy games, constructing buildings from barracks to air defence systems.

During the 1990s, there was a whole scene of young guys in Finland making and playing small action-oriented PC games like this, known as suomipelit (“finngames”). The games were distributed via disk swapping and through bulletin board systems (BBS), and eventually also through the Internet (see TASO’s entry in Suomipelit.fi). Many of the most popular finngames, like AUTS and Wings, were split-screen multiplayer flying games inspired by a Finnish Amiga game called Turboraketti. TASO combined split-screen flying with elements from the first real-time strategy game I ever saw, Dune 2. The result was fairly successful. In 1997, TASO was awarded the first prize in a national game development competition co-organized by Housemarque.

TASO 131 supports up to four players, which can be AI players or human players playing on a single computer using split-screen graphics. Fitting eight hands on a single keyboard is an interesting metagame in its own right.

description: Michingan's busiest airport - KDTW arrives to Tower! Simulator 3 - the primary international airport serving Detroit with six runways, two terminals, and 4 concourses with a total of 147 gates keeping you busy controlling!

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Submarines
description: Submarines DLC gets you a new challenge awaiting you. Submarines, which bring many new challenges and possibilities! Get ready to smash some Submarines!

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Schmitz Cargobull Trailer Pack
description: Schmitz Cargobull is known for its innovative designs and high-quality trailers, making it a trusted name in the automotive industry. With eight new Schmitz Cargobull trailers and five cabin accessories, you will never miss the deadline to deliver your cargo!

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Scania S BEV
description: Enjoy the Scania S BEV in Euro Truck Simulator 2! The Scania 40 S and 45 S BEV, which are both based on the Scania S with a 4x2 chassis, feature two powertrain options, a 6-speed transmission combined with 3 electric motors with a power output of 400/450 kW. For now only as Quick Jobs trucks.

name: Ham Pafe: Hamster no Sweets Puzzle
description: This is a puzzle game that combines easy difficulty and hamster raising for little kids to enjoy. Let's raise various hamsters in a cage!

name: Alice's Hanny Hanny Crush!
description: Alice's Hanny Hanny Crush! is a casual Hack & Slash game featuring satisfying Hanny crushing!Please show no sympathy. Afterall, they are just ceramics. Share your results on social media to show off your Hanny crushing skills!

name: Commentator
description: "Commentator" is a novel game where you become a commentator for a popular news program. By selecting the news to comment on and your critique stance, you will experience a manipulation of public opinion and a changing a world.

name: Kamigoroshi
description: Sin descripción

name: 3D Puzzle: Courtyard
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: 3D Puzzle: Deserted Village
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: 180 Seconds: A Firefighter's Call
description: 180 Seconds is all about choices and consequences. Arriving at the scene of a fire, you will have only 3-5 minutes to rescue people from a burning building. You must decide what to prioritize once inside. Can you save everyone or will your choices seal the fate of those depending on you?

name: 1 vs. 1 Football Tournament
description: 1 vs 1 Football Tournament is a fast-paced game that puts your football skills to the test.

name: White Cat Adventure Team
description: You will play the role of the White Cat Adventure Team, embarking on adventures on this fantasy continent and experiencing the story. Search and collect various skills and items to face various battles.

name: Mainichi Danjo Irekawari Seikatsu?! My Body Your Body
description: "My Body Your Body" is a novel game where the protagonist and three heroines find themselves under a curse that swaps their bodies. As they navigate everyday activities like changing clothes and bathing, they search for a way to reverse the situation in this gender-swapping story.

name: Sokubaku Kanojo to Pet na Boku: I'm Your Pet
description: Wouldn't anyone be happy to have a girlfriend who makes them lunch and comes to pick them up every morning? If I had to pick one flaw...it would be that this love is very suffocating...

name: Zrust
description: Will you be the greatest space pirate? Build your ship, plunder enemies, and conquer the galaxy in Zrust!

name: ZonZon
description: The main character is a journalist who arrived at a large warehouse to record a documentary about the warehouse operation. But instead, he is faced with a real nightmare. The warehouse turns out to be populated by hungry guards and crazy warehouse operators who turn it into a death trap.

name: Zone One
description: Step into the role of Z1, a mercenary unit to search for evidence of an alien species that is invading a space station, an immersive bodycam style first-person shooter, solo or up to 5 players.

name: Zombie Treasure Land
description: Play the role of Maoshan Taoist , go on an adventure to solve puzzles.

name: Zombiehood
description: Zombiehood is a run-and-gun, zombie-killing, rogue-lite, sandbox game with tight controls and emergent gameplay systems. Also loot. Lots of loot. Additionally, the code is fully open-sourced, inviting you to learn, remix, adapt, and create new content.

name: Youth Northbound
description: This is a story about a runaway male protagonist and a runaway female protagonist who reunite and fall in love in Northeast China. They live in a very embarrassing situation but continue to support each other to get through tough times.

name: You Struck Gold
description: Stranded on a mining planet, your escape hinges on quarrying gold. Solve challenging puzzles by using unique card abilities to uncover riches and escape in this strategic, card-based puzzle game!

name: You See Me?
description: What do you think consciousness is? Is it a mirror of the soul or a dark labyrinth filled with fears? Losing your only friend means losing your sanity.

name: Zaru
description: Explore a PSX-style horror game where your senses are your tools for survival. Sacrifice one sense for another to detect threats and make it out alive. Experience the sensory deprivation as you sneak throughout the warehouse, doing your last tasks for the night.

name: Zenith Armada
description: Embark on interstellar conquest in a 2D space strategy game. Command ships, explore galaxies, engage in real-time battles, and customize your fleet. Traverse hazardous star maps, unlock factions, and strategize for victory. Are you ready to conquer the cosmos?

name: Zero Factory
description: Embark on a journey from Stone Age to industrial power in Zero Factory, where survival meets automation in a magical, corrupted world. Face bosses, harness artifacts, and build a mechanical empire.

name: Zero-Sum Heart
description: "I" make a deal with the witch to give up my heart, in exchange for love— from everyone. Is it worth it if losing my heart means gaining *his*?———————————————————————In this short visual novel, make choices and answer the question: is love a zero-sum game?

name: Zombetes
description: Face the undead apocalypse while managing your diabetes. ZOMBETES is a gripping text-based game where every choice is crucial to your survival. Navigate procedural levels, scavenge for insulin, food, and supplies, and fight to stay alive in this unique blend of survival and strategy.

name: Z-ombie Apocalypse: Mark Feygin's War
description: Z-ombie Apocalypse is a third-person shooter in the Survival Horror genre with allegorical and satirical references to the Russian invasion of Ukraine, as well as to the role of Mark Feygin and his YouTube channel in the information war and its geopolitical consequences.

name: Zombie Dolls
description: Fend off hordes of cute zombified dolls using guns, bombs, bats, and boomerangs. Zombie Dolls is a light-hearted, but intense, stand your ground shoot em up game. Don't be fooled by their friendly appearance, they are tough and unrelenting!

name: Zombi Efem
description: Join the battle for survival against zombies with "Zombi Efem"! Play solo or online with up to four players in both TPS and FPS modes. This horror survival game invites you to face challenging combats and thrilling moments. Plan your strategy, prepare your weapons, and fight to survive!

name: Zilar: Empire of The Underground
description: Zilar is an exploration adventure game developed by two young developers, where we control the main character Zemandevi.

name: Wing Commander
description: You have to protect various installations on your island in this flight simulator.

name: Yixin
description: The first love simulator, the real immersive real-life love game, the video novel type, the only pure love experience, takes you into the pure and beautiful love world that seems like dreams, and feels the emotion that has been buried in your heart for a long time.

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Costume "Delta Replica"
description: Cool Scarlet Delta costumes are newly available for Yohane!
